parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the team the unit belongs to. Possible values:

* <tt>"MAIN"</tt> (default and white)
* <tt>"RED"</tt>
* <tt>"GREEN"</tt>
* <tt>"BLUE"</tt>
* <tt>"YELLOW"</tt>
* <tt>""</tt> if given unit is [[objNull]] or [[remoteControl]]ing another unit(Since Arma 3 v1.93.145625)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''assignedTeam''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] (or, prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625, [[Nothing]] if given unit is [[objNull]] or [[remoteControl]]ing another unit)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_team <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''assignedTeam''' [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignTeam]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 13, 2014 - 23:56 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">

'''Prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625''' assignedTeam might return nil instead of any of the STRINGs above if the player is currently remote controlling a unit.

<code>[[assignedTeam]] [[player]]
-></code>
</dd>
</dl>
